work.name: Ethoscope
work.summary: I empower organizations to implement AI aligned with their values, implement governance that protects their brand, and audit technology for regulatory compliance.

work.name: Caroll University
work.summary: Designed and delivered laboratory curriculum for animal training students, integrating research analysis, hands-on learning exercises, and foundational statistics instruction to enhance practical and analytical skills.

work.name: Animal Behavioral Wellness
work.summary: Managed employees, operations, and client relationships while delivering tailored solutions—honing expertise in stakeholder engagement, risk assessment, and ethical decision-making.

volunteer.summary: I develop criteria for auditing schemes at ForHumanity, helping establish professional standards for responsible AI.

volunteer.organization: Engineering Change Lab and Tech Stewardship
volunteer.summary: Developed strategies within a Theory of Change framework to guide tech and AI stewardship programs, driving field-wide influence and promoting technology for good.

awards.title: Responsible AI Governance Maturity Model Hackathon Winner
awards.awarder: All Tech is Human and TechBetter
awards.summary: Applied AI ethics skills to evaluate the AI governance of a company using public documentation.

awards.title: Data Science Portfolio Project with Distinction
awards.summary: Built a machine learning model to predict preterm birth using diverse data, earning a Top Project award.

projects.name: Ethical Matrix and Discussion Guide for Behavioral Euthanasia of Companion Animals
projects.summary: Developed a novel tool to conduct ethical decision making and reduce moral stress in veterinarians and adjacent caregivers.
